channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Abarth 600e Brings Affordable Fun To Electric Driving – With One Flaw
item.description: The Abarth 600e gets close to bringing the hot hatch fully into the electric era. But one deficiency prevents it from being the complete all-rounder.

item.title: Russian Broker Offers $4 Million For Telegram Zero-Day App Attack
item.description: A broker that only sells to Russian private and government organizations has just offered $4 million for a zero-day hack attack against the Telegram m...

item.title: The Most Common ‘Severance’ Season 2 Finale Theory Is Wrong
item.description: A Severance actor has shot down the most prevalent finale theory about her character explicitly, and fans should believe her.

item.title: 2 Facts You Need To Accept For A Happy Marriage — By A Psychologist
item.description: If you want a healthy marriage, there’s two things you’ll have to learn first. Accept them for better, or resent them for worse.

item.title: LG Exec, Capgemini Study Lay Out Reasons EV Adoption Stuck In Neutral
item.description: A scad of challenges is preventing EV sales from increasing as quickly as the industry hoped according to a top LG executive and industry study.

item.description: Simply say it. The first minute of a speech, the first paragraph of a novel or the tuning of the orchestra before they begin… The performance improves...

item.title: Waves and tides
item.description: It’s easy to be distracted by the wave that’s crashing on the shore. On the other hand, the tide is inexorable. It’s the long-term trend, the one that...
